qrList.label: User
qrList.title: Test send
qrList.message:
/setvar key=varname preset |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=true rule=eq else={:
  /setvar key=userinput {{input}}
:}
{:
  /run {{getvar::preset}}.userprocess |
  /setvar key=append
:} |

/if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq else={:
  /send {{getvar::userinput}}
{{getvar::append}}
:}
{:
  /setvar key=blocktrigger false
:} ||
/setinput

qrList.label: ‚ùåüí¨
qrList.title: Delete message

qrList.label: ‚úÇ.?!
qrList.title: Delete last sentence. Saves orig message.

qrList.label: ‚ùåü´Ñ
qrList.title: Remove <tags>, [bracketed messages], and asterisks. Saves orig message.
qrList.message:
/hide {{lastMessageId}} | /flushvar toreplace |
/setvar key=regexflags gi |

/setvar key=regex <style>[\S\s]+?<\/style>\|<(?!!--\|\/?thinking\|\/?meter\|\/?progress\|\/?data\|\/?a \|\/?img)[\S\s]*?>\|(?<=\n)[^\n\S]+(?!\n\n[^\s])\|\* |
/regex name=regexreplace {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=msg |

/setvar key=regexflags gmi |
/setvar key=regex (?<=<a[^\n<]+?href=['"][^\n<]+?)['"][\S\s]*?> |
/setvar key=toreplace zz zz |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} |
/setvar key=msg |

/setvar key=regex (?<=<img[^\n<]+?src=['"][^\n<]+?)['"][\S\s]*?>\|<img[^\n<]+?src=['"]\|<a[^\n<]+?href=['"]\|(?<![:\-=]\s)\[[\S\s]*?\](?!\() |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} |
/setvar key=msg |

/setvar key=regex zz |
/flushvar toreplace |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} |
/setvar key=msg |

/setvar key=regexflags gi |
/setvar key=regex (?<=[^\n]\n)\n+\|^\s+\|\s+$ |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} |
/setvar key=msg <details>
<summary>TEXT FORM</summary>
{{pipe}}
</details>

|

/len {{char}} |
/if left={{pipe}} rule=lte right=0 else={:
  /pass {{char}} |
  /sendas name={{pipe}} {{getvar::msg}}
:}
{:
  /comment {{getvar::msg}}
:}

qrList.label: ü¶ñ
qrList.title: Replace words/phrases. Saves orig message.

qrList.label: thesaurusreplace
qrList.message:
/setvar key=startregex \s* | /setvar key=endregex \s+= |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=from |

/setvar key=startregex \s+=\s+ | /setvar key=endregex \s*\n |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=to |

/setvar key=toreplace {{getvar::to}} |
/setvar key=regexflags gi |
/setvar key=regex {{getvar::from}} |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} | /setvar key=msg |

/flushvar toreplace |
/setvar key=regexflags mi |
/setvar key=regex ^[\S\s]+?$ |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::thesaurus}} |
/setvar key=thesaurus | /setvar key=tomsgprocess |

/len {{getvar::thesaurus}} | /setvar key=len |
/if left=len rule=lte right=0 "/setvar key=looping false" |

/if left=thesaurus rule=lte right=0 {:
  /setvar key=looping false
:}
